feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a new large Take Quiz button on the landing page and its associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files including components, utilities, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base layer defining extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component toggling between landing and quiz views via local state.
frontend/src/components/DailyCheckIn.tsx: Daily wellness check-in component with sliders, score calculation, tips, and results display.
frontend/src/components/FooterAttributio: Footer component showing fixed team attribution text.
frontend/src/components/PhysioTrackLandi: Landing page with header, hero, CTA buttons, feature sections, and scroll-triggered daily check‑in reveal.
frontend/src/components/QuizPage.tsx: Quiz page generating random questions, collecting answers, scoring results, and showing tips and restart controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks; currently empty.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/quiz.ts: Contains quiz question data and utilities for selecting random questions, scoring answers, and generating tips.
frontend/src/lib/scoring.ts: Implements health score calculation and generates personalized wellness tips based on daily check‑in data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom themes, typography, animations, and plugin setups.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature states, and pending requests for the 'Take Quiz' button enhancement.
